attributes.action: Set up a new form of Democracy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We want a new Parliament and method of Government

Members of the new Parliament are to be elected every 5 years

We want to have referenda on all the issues previously decided in Parliament

The Members of Parliament will discuss issues in Parliament but the decision to be determined by the majority vote in the referenda

The discussions are to be televised on a nationally available TV channel

The referenda are to be held using PCs in homes in the UK and voting stations containing PCs for those who do not have access to a personal computer at home.

There will be one vote per person for all UK residents aged 18 or over

The setting up, maintenance, security and results of the voting system are to done by a body independent from Parliament

The issues that will be discussed in Parliament are to be the most popular on a live list of concerns held on a database

Each UK resident will be able to add to the list of concerns or register their approval for an item on the list.

Each approval of an item on the list will count towards it’s popularity and subsequent discussion in Parliament.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
